SEARCH
Package network.structure

Class ClientRMI

java.lang.Object
observer.Observable
network.structure.ClientRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable, Remote, Client, ClientHandler
public class ClientRMI extends Observable implements Client, Runnable, ClientHandler
this class represents an RMI client.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientRMI

      public ClientRMI(String address, int port, ClientController clientController) throws RemoteException
      Default constructor for the RMI client with the connection to the server.
      Parameters:
      address - is the IP of the server.
      port - is the port for the connection.
      clientController - is the controller for the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when the server is not reachable.
